name: polars-cli
description: Data analysis CLI using Polars (similar to pandas in Python)

prompts.name: data_source
prompts.question: What type of data will you be working with?

prompts.name: analysis_type
prompts.question: What type of analysis do you plan to perform?

prompts.name: visualization
prompts.question: Do you need data visualization capabilities?

next_steps: 📊 Try the example analysis: cd {{project_name}} && cargo run -- analyze -f data/example_data.csv
📈 Run statistical analysis: cargo run -- analyze -f data/example_data.csv -s
🔍 Group data by department: cargo run -- analyze -f data/example_data.csv -g department -a salary -u mean
🧮 Generate sample data: cargo run -- generate -r 100 -o data/my_data.csv
📚 See all available commands: cargo run -- help
